name: Famo.me
body:
### Famo.Me
## The Famo Thing

This automatic awesome generator is the easiest way to create beautiful layouts for your Famo.us projects. 

* Layout Stuff
* Preview Stuff
* GenerateStuff

Then just Include GeneratedStuffParser module and your GeneratedStuff in your project like so:

```
require('GeneratedStuffParse')
require('GeneratedStuff.json') // How?
// Go forth
```

![Start up the application](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/famome/famo.me/gh-pages/images/1-Startup.png)

![Drag and drop regions. Translate elements around layout in free or snap to grid modes](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/famome/famo.me/gh-pages/images/2-Building.png)

![Generate code with the click of a mouse button](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/famome/famo.me/gh-pages/images/3-Generate.png)


![Use the code in your Famo.us project and edit the generated regions as you see fit](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/famome/famo.me/gh-pages/images/4-Utilize.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
